item.title: By: dragonbite
item.dc:creator: dragonbite
item.description:
I've been looking for something to lighten the footprint of Ubuntu on my hardware. It is not new but works alright.
Ubuntu with Unity worked OK, but was a little slow Xfce does run fine, but I do like the look/feel of Unity and Gnome. Switched to Fedora and Gnome and it works better than Unity and is useful.
Gotta try this out and see if it makes enough of a difference for me to switch back.
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been looking for something to lighten the footprint of Ubuntu on my hardware. It is not new but works alright.

Ubuntu with Unity worked OK, but was a little slow
Xfce does run fine, but I do like the look/feel of Unity and Gnome.
Switched to Fedora and Gnome and it works better than Unity and is useful.

Gotta try this out and see if it makes enough of a difference for me to switch back.
